property.name: SplitDns
property.tp:docstring: Information for configuring "split DNS". Each element of the first array defines a different network, defined as: the name of the interface the configuration applies to, an array of nameservers (as IP address strings), an array of domains served by those nameservers, and an array of IP address ranges served by those nameservers. The second array lists the remaining "fallback" DNS servers.
